events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and want to request a refund for the purchase as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund since the customer requests money back for the mistaken order.
Agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request for the order mix-up.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the wrong item you received to help us process the refund efficiently?
Here is my order number 54321 and attached are photos showing the incorrect product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid label for you to return the wrong item.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and the return label for the incorrect product.
Your refund has been processed successfully and a return shipping label was sent to your email. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that everything is now resolved with your order issue.
The case has been closed based on the customer confirmation that the refund was received and issue resolved.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the refund experience and support provided.
